name: next-middy-monorepo
description: Type-safe, composable middleware framework for Next.js API routes with optional Zod integration.
author: Eugene Odeluga <eodeluga@users.noreply.github.com> (https://github.com/eodeluga)

scripts.bootstrap: echo 'ğŸ“¦ Installing workspace depsâ€¦' && yarn install --silent && echo 'âœ… Dependencies linked.'
scripts.build: echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Buildingâ€¦' && tsc -p packages/next-middy/tsconfig.json && echo 'âœ… Build complete.'
scripts.clean: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaningâ€¦' && find . -type d \( -name 'node_modules' -o -name '.tsbuildinfo' -o -name 'coverage' -o -name '.vitest-cache' -o -name 'dist' \) -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type f -name 'yarn.lock' -delete && echo 'âœ… Clean complete.'
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn install && yarn run build
